channel.title: My blogs on random things
channel.description: Recent content on My blogs on random things

item.title: Workflow for Publishing Blogs From iPad using Bear and Hugo
item.description: Ever since I bought myself an iPad mini, I wanted to use it more and more trying my hardest to justify the purchase. But that is not to say it is a bad device or anything, but I could just blog normally using my laptop. But… that’s just not as interesting. So here is a slightly contrived way to blog directly from iPad using the Bear app, a toy server and Github pages.

item.title: Dijkstra’s Shortest Path Algorithm: Intuition for proof and code in Python
item.description: What is shortest path? If you are already familiar with what Dijkstra’s shortest path algorithm intends to do then skip this section. A graph, for those who are unfamiliar or have forgotten, is just a collection of ordered pairs of “points” which are also called edges. These pairs of points may have a distance associated with them in which case they are known as “weighted”. Given a graph with positive weights and a source “vertex” i.
